data.name: Sebil Engineering
data.detailed_description:
Sebil Engineering is a game about fixing roads. It features open ended gameplay, a branching level structure and levels designed to be solved in numerous different ways. Play in overhead view or drop down a surveyor tool to get right into the action in first person view, where you can explore the level on foot, adjust roads more precisely and try not to get yourself run over.

Key Features

  • 30+ Levels & extra secret levels
  • Branching level structure - choose where you go next
  • Open ended gameplay with many solutions - play how you like
  • High detail traffic simulation
  • Realistic Civil Engineering

data.short_description: Sebil Engineering is a game about fixing roads. Use your wrench and hammer to guide the cars to their destination. Play in overhead view or run around in first person and explore + solve the levels on foot.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bit versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 32-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel High Definition Audio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: now Leopard 10.6
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
